description: A Chef or Cook is responsible for using their culinary expertise to create appetizing dishes for diners to enjoy

recipes.cooking_method: Roasting is a slow-cooking process, using indirect, diffused heat to cook its ingredients. It is a dry-heat cooking method where hot air surrounds the food and cooks it evenly on all sides at a temperature of at least 300 째F (or 150 째C). The heat can also be derived from an open flame, an oven, or another heat source..

ingredients: 1 pound beef sirloin, sliced into thin strips
recipes.cooking_method: In a wok or large skillet, heat 1 tablespoon of oil over high heat.Add the beef and stir-fry until browned.Add the broccoli and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes.In a small bowl, mix together the cornstarch, soy sauce, and sesame oil.Add the sauce to the wok and stir-fry until the sauce thickens and coats the beef and broccoli

Preheat a grill or grill pan to high heat. Season the beef with salt and pepper.Grill the beef for 2-3 minutes per side, until browned.In a pot of boiling water, blanch the broccoli for 2-3 minutes.In a large skillet, heat the sauce over medium heat until it thickens.Add the beef and broccoli to the skillet and toss to coat in the sauce

description: A chef is a professional cook who is skilled in preparing and cooking a variety of dishes

recipes.cooking_method: In a mixing bowl, combine the ground pork, shrimp, green onions, and soy sauce.Spoon a small amount of the mixture into each wonton wrapper and fold it into a triangle or purse shape.In a large pot of boiling water, cook the wontons for 3-5 minutes or until they float to the surface.Serve hot with soy sauce or dipping sauce of your choice

In a bowl, marinate the chicken pieces in soy sauce, Shaoxing wine, and cornstarch for 10-15 minutes.Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over high heat. Add the marinated chicken pieces and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes, until browned and cooked through. Remove the chicken from the wok and set aside

Heat the vegetable oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the ground pork and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, until browned and cooked through.Add the Sichuan peppercorns and dried chili flakes to the wok and stir-fry for another 10-20 seconds, until fragrant.

description: A pastry chef is a specialized type of chef who focuses on creating and decorating pastries, desserts, and baked goods

recipes.cooking_method: In a large pot, cover the pork belly with water and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for about 45 minutes, or until the pork is cooked through. Remove the pork from the pot and let it cool slightly. Cut the pork into thin slices. Heat the vegetable oil in a wok or large frying pan over high heat.

In a small bowl, whisk together the honey, soy sauce, rice wine, five spice powder, salt, and white pepper. Place the pork belly in a large resealable plastic bag and pour in the marinade. Seal the bag and refrigerate for at least 4 hours, or up to overnight. Preheat the oven to 375째F. Line a baking sheet with foil and place a wire rack on top.

ingredients: 1 lb pork shoulder, cut into strips
recipes.cooking_method: In a large bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, honey, hoisin sauce, five spice powder, and garlic. Add the pork shoulder strips and toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours, or up to overnight. Preheat the oven to 375째F. Line a baking sheet with foil and place a wire rack on top.

description: A  chef, also known as a line cook or  cook, is responsible for cooking and preparing food on a grill or flat-top griddle in a restaurant or commercial kitchen setting.

recipes.cooking_method: In a large bowl, whisk together the soy sauce, hoisin sauce, ginger, garlic, and red pepper flakes. Add the lamb shoulder slices and toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes, or up to 4 hours. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over high heat.

In a large pot, heat the vegetable oil over medium-high heat. Add the mutton leg and brown on all sides for 5-7 minutes. Add the sliced onion, carrot, celery, garlic, ginger, and sliced shiitake mushrooms to the pot. Stir-fry for another 3-5 minutes.Pour in the water and add the soy sauce, dark soy sauce.

In a large bowl, mix together the mutton, onion, garlic, cumin, chili powder, Sichuan peppercorns, salt, and vegetable oil. Marinate for at least 2 hours, or overnight.Thread the marinated mutton cubes onto the bamboo skewers. Preheat a grill or grill pan to high heat. Grill the skewers for 2-3 minutes on each side, until the mutton is cooked through.

description: A Noodles chef is the second-in-command in a kitchen, responsible for   ensuring that all dishes are prepared to the highest standards

recipes.cooking_method: Cook the noodles according to the package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside. In a wok or large skillet, heat the vegetable oil over high heat. Add the ground pork and stir-fry for 5-7 minutes, until browned and cooked through. Add the chopped peanuts, scallions, chili oil

Cook the noodles according to the package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.In a wok or large pot, heat the vegetable oil over medium-high heat. Add the sliced shiitake mushrooms and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes, until browned and fragrant

Cook the noodles according to the package instructions until al dente. Drain and rinse with cold water. Set aside.In a bowl, whisk together the peanut butter, soy sauce, sesame oil, rice vinegar, honey, grated ginger, and minced garlic until smooth. Gradually whisk in hot water

description: A barbecue chef is a skilled cook who specializes in preparinga variety of rubs to enhance flavor

recipes.cooking_method: Blanch Chinese broccoli, stir-fry with garlic and oil, add oyster sauce

ingredients: 1 bell pepper, cut into bite-sized pieces
recipes.cooking_method: Dredge the fish pieces in cornstarch, shaking off any excess. Heat about 1 inch of vegetable oil in a wok or deep frying pan over medium-high heat. Once the oil is hot, add the fish in batches and fry until golden brown and crispy, about 3-4 minutes per side. Use a slotted spoon to transfer the cooked fish to a paper towel-lined plate to drain any excess oil. In the same wok or pan, stir-fry the bell pepper and onion over high heat until they begin to soften, about 2-3 minutes

ingredients: 1 large eggplant, cut into bite-sized pieces
recipes.cooking_method: Dredge the fish pieces in cornstarch, shaking off any excess. Heat about 1 inch of vegetable oil in a wok or deep frying pan over medium-high heat. Once the oil is hot, add the fish in batches and fry until golden brown and crispy, about 3-4 minutes per side. Use a slotted spoon to transfer the cooked fish to a paper towel-lined plate to drain any excess oil. In the same wok or pan, stir-fry the eggplant, garlic, ginger, and chili bean paste over high heat until the eggplant is soft and golden brown, about 5-6 minutes.
